1.0.0.en: First release to control your Blauberg Fan

1.0.1.en: Added links to source and forum

1.1.0.en: Added flow card support for the main operations

1.1.1.en: Added additional flow cards, conditions for the alarms

1.2.0.en: Bug fixes and support for new fan_speed capability

1.2.6.en: Move driver json configurations to .homeycompose folder to ease future support for more brands

1.2.7.en: Extract mapping of modbus responses to separate file
